alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; East Central Plains; Northeast Highlands; Northeast Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 02 at 3:22AM MDT until April 04 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM SUNDAY FOR THE NORTHEAST AND CENTRAL HIGHLANDS AS WELL AS THE NORTHEAST AND EAST CENTRAL PLAINS DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY AND AN UNSTABLE ATMOSPHERE... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR MUCH OF THE REGION DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AN UNSTABLE ATMOSPHERE AND POOR HUMIDITY RECOVER MONDAY NIGHT INTO TUESDAY... .An extended period of widespread critical fire weather conditions will impact the region through Tuesday. The focus will be across eastern NM through Sunday before spreading to much of the region Monday. Critical fire weather may persist into Monday night across parts of central and eastern New Mexico with poor overnight humidity recovery. Critical conditions persist Tuesday with high winds. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * AREA AND TIMING...This includes the Northeast Plains (Zone 104) and Northeast Highlands (Zone 123) from 11 AM to 8 PM Sunday. A Fire Weather Watch is in effect from 9 AM Monday to 9 PM Tuesday. * 20 FOOT WINDS...West-southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph Sunday afternoon. West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph Monday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Minimum values 8 to 12 percent Sunday, then 5 to 12 percent Monday and Tuesday. Several hours of single digit relative humidity values are likely each day with very little humidity recover Monday night. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Fire Weather Watch.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; East Central Plains; Northeast Highlands; Northeast Plains
